uv: Python Package and Project Manager

Overview

uv is an extremely fast Python package and project manager, written in Rust. It aims to be a comprehensive replacement for multiple Python tools including pip, pip-tools, pipx, poetry, pyenv, twine, and virtualenv.

Key Highlights

  • 🚀 Single tool to replace multiple Python package management tools
  • ⚡️ 10-100x faster than pip for package installation
  • 🗂️ Comprehensive project management with universal lockfile
  • ❇️ Script running with inline dependency metadata support
  • 🐍 Python version installation and management
  • 🛠️ Tool installation and running
  • 🔩 Pip-compatible interface
  • 💾 Disk-space efficient with global cache

Installation

curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh

Quick Usage Examples

Project Management

uv init example
cd example
uv add ruff
uv run ruff check
uv lock
uv sync

Script Management

echo 'import requests; print(requests.get("https://astral.sh"))' > example.py
uv add --script example.py requests
uv run example.py

Tool Running

uvx pycowsay "hello world!"
uv tool install ruff
ruff --version

Python Version Management

uv python install 3.10 3.11 3.12
uv venv --python 3.12.0
uv run --python pypy@3.8 -- python

Created from official uv documentation at docs.astral.sh/uv
